ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates the performance of SciChart's ExtremeScatterRenderableSeries when a paletteprovider is attached
ExampleDefinition.Description:
The PaletteProvider feature allows you to change color of a scatter point, line segment, mountain segment, OHLC/Candlestick bar or column based on the data-value, or other data in your data-point.
This feature was notoriously slow when used in conjunction with XyScatterRenderableSeries and users demanded more performance.
We're using here our redesigned and fast XyScatterRenderableSeries type that is optimised for Big-Data and color changes via a PaletteProvider-like API.
